name.en: Theory and Design of Educational Board Games

department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
學習目標：
1)能理解與應用情境認知理論來發展假新聞防治之學習方法
2)能掌握教育桌遊設計方法
3)能結合上述兩個目標設計出假新聞防治桌遊
goal.en:
Course Objectives:

1. To comprehend and apply the theory of situational cognition in developing learning methods for combating fake news.
2. To master the methods of designing educational board games.
3. To integrate the above two objectives in designing board games for combating fake news.

outline.ch:
課程簡介
本課程以設計假新聞防治桌遊為題，引領參與者體驗、了解與應用教育桌遊設計流程，期待參與者在參與課程後對於教育桌遊設計的思考重點、流程、設計方法都能了解，甚至內化。
為達成上述課程設計構想，本課程採取「互動工作坊」的形式授課，以大量師生、生生、小組互動與討論、實作等活動作為授課方法，並帶入學習學重要文獻的討論來深化關於「學習」與「教育」的想法。
課程由以下單元組成，細節請參考課程進度
1)序曲
2)期初假新聞防治桌遊設計
3)教育桌遊體驗與設計流程
4)假新聞研究
5)假新聞學習機制研究
6)假新聞防治遊戲機制發想、雛形設計、測試與製作
7)慶祝與回顧
本課程是教學者多年來研究教育遊戲、教育桌遊、設計思考的概念整合，也是國內少數（或者唯一）將設計思考、學習理論、遊戲設計整合為教育桌遊設計的教學案例，機會相當難得，敬請把握。
outline.en:
Course Introduction
This course focuses on designing board games to combat fake news, guiding participants to experience, understand, and apply the process of educational board game design. It is expected that participants will gain an understanding, and even internalize, the key points, processes, and design methods of educational board game design after participating in the course.
To achieve the aforementioned course design concept, the course adopts the format of “interactive workshops,“ using activities such as extensive teacher-student, peer-to-peer, group interaction and discussion, practical work, and incorporating discussions on important literature to deepen ideas about “learning“ and “education.“
The course consists of the following units; please refer to the course schedule for details:
1. Prelude
2. Initial Design of Board Games for Combating Fake News
3. Experience and Design Process of Educational Board Games
4. Fake News Research
5. Research on Mechanisms of Learning about Fake News
6. Ideation, Prototype Design, Testing, and Production of Anti-Fake News Game Mechanisms
7. Celebration and Review
This course is an integration of concepts from years of research on educational games, educational board games, and design thinking by educators. It is also one of the few (or perhaps the only) teaching cases in the country to integrate design thinking, learning theory, and game design into educational board game design. It is a rare opportunity, so please make the most of it.

gradMethod.ch:
1.【設計日誌】x 4 +【閱讀摘要】x 2 (20％)
2.小組【假新聞防治研究報告】x 1 (7％)
3.小組【假新聞防治學習機制報告】x 1 (8％)
4.學期初與期末【防治假新聞桌遊設計】x 2 (40％)
5.【我的改變】x 1 (15％)
6.【我的學習歷程回顧】x 1 (10％)
gradMethod.en:
1. [Design Journal] x 4 + [Reading Summary] x 2 (20％)
2. Group [Fake News Prevention Research Report] x 1 (7％)
3. Group [Fake News Prevention Learning Mechanism Report] x 1 (8％)
4. Semester Initial and Final [Anti-Fake News Board Game Design] x 2 (40％)
5. [My Changes] x 1 (15％)
6. [Review of My Learning Journey] x 1 (10％)

flexDiscription.ch:
彈性教學包含：
1. 小組桌遊機制精緻化
2. 小組桌遊美術精緻化
3. 小組與授課教師個別討論桌遊設計相關議題
flexDiscription.en:
Flexible teaching includes:
1. Refinement of group board game mechanics.
2. Refinement of group board game artwork.
3. Individual discussions between groups and the teaching instructor on topics related to board game design.
